Reviews.Title: “Stone Castle Rating”
Reviews.Author: Judy C
Reviews.Content: The room was too small for four adults. Pictures on the internet showed better rooms. The bathroom was so small you could barely shut the door and turn around to shower, etc. The hotel reservation desk was OK when we check in but when we checked out it was a different story. We had a message on our phone saying we had a package at the desk. They could not find anything??????? So who knows where it is. I left a note to be sent to Branson Vacationland that we needed to turn in before we left showing we had taken advantage of the presentation we were assigned (tried to leave it with them directly but they were closed as we left early a.m) so the checkout person said,reluectantly, that they could send it when they sent their next billing to BV. I asked that she run a copy for me, sign and date it so I had something to followup with in the event they did not do it. She grabbed a pen and scribbled on the copy and "shoved" it at me. Her supervisor was sitting in the next room, saw and hear everything, and never came to the counter to see what was going on. I would never stay there again, nor recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “46th engr reunion”
Reviews.Author: jeepin647
Reviews.Content: My wife and I felt that our experience at Stone Castle with the room, staff and food was the best. It was a very nicely done event by all the staff and given the plumbing issue at our building(B), they handled it all well.

Reviews.Title: “our family get-a-way”
Reviews.Author: elizaaabethwalker
Reviews.Content: we had a terrific stay. Comfortable beds, privacy, game room, swimming and wonderful hot tub after driving, ad the breakfast serviced , better than my own to say the least. Have recommended to all my friends and customers.

Reviews.Title: “OK for the money”
Reviews.Author: wass1
Reviews.Content: Not a great place, but decent for the money. We didn't notice any musty smells a couple of other reviewers mentioned, but the place seemed a bit worn. Very nice breakfast. Beds were comfortable, and I liked the 'blackout' curtains. I'd stay there again. Good location, convenient.

Reviews.Title: “OK, but not going to stay again...”
Reviews.Author: Dena2
Reviews.Content: Check is was smooth, no problems at all. Front desk staff was friendly. We had a 3rd floor room, which was nice. The hotel wasn't busy, so finding a good parking spot was easy. However, when we went into the building....the musty odor was horrible, the lobby area was humid as if the air conditioning wasn't on, the elevator smelled musty. Opening the door, our room was musty and it smelled horrible. The beds were comfortable and clean, the bathroom was very small but clean. I noticed that there weren't any extra outlets, we had to unplug the clock so I could plug in my laptop. Management should really address the musty smell of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Alright”
Reviews.Author: Beavorsden
Reviews.Content: This place was "ok" there was extremely dirty carpet. (room 205-in case the owner reads & wants to fix) the blankets were torn. They don't leave any soap-shampoo like most places do. Beds were fairly comfortable. But will nor stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and value!”
Reviews.Author: CapitolTexan
Reviews.Content: Stone Castle is very convenient to the main strip in Branson, but is also accessible to the relief routes that avoid traffic The rooms were very clean and the beds were super comfortable. The free breakfast buffet in the morning was delicious and had a good variety. I highly doubt there is a better room for the price in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Great place.”
Reviews.Author: Lesia C
Reviews.Content: We stayed there the weekend of the summer cruise. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable. We ate breakfast the first day and it was very good. Had no problems with the staff and maid service was also good. Very cold air which my husband likes. Will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay for a couple days or a week”
Reviews.Author: Ray N
Reviews.Content: From check in to check out, everything was great. The price was right and our room was first class. The only bad thing I have to say is my Wife loved the bed in our room and now that we are back home (St. Louis, MO), it looks like I will be buying a new bed. The breakfast (free & hot) was perfect and the staff was very accommodating.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: kredburn
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very comfortable, with a full buffet breakfast. Staff were very helpful. Other reviews state that the rooms are small, but I found they were just a little more narrow than other properties. Location is perfect: off the busy 76 highway, but handy via backroads to all the shows and restaurants. Would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful anniversary trip”
Reviews.Author: nanny19keytesville
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a theme king size jacuzzi room (French Quarters) and it was a wonderful experience. We had a big sitting area with windows and a king size bed with a nice flat screen tv but the best part was the jacuzzi tub in the room, We also had a tub and shower in the bathroom. The maid service was good and everyone who worked there was helpful and friendly. The free breakfast was a buffet of hot foods in a big conf room area with plently of food and lots of places to sit. I would highly recommend this hotel. There was just the two of us but it is also family friendly with indoor pool and an arcade room.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected”
Reviews.Author: delayna815
Reviews.Content: Upon pulling up to the hotel I was pleased with the appearance, that is where my pleasure ended! Once inside the hotel it smelled so musty I opened the window in my room to discover it didn't even lock (we had a main floor room, so window locks are a MUST) Husband went to the front desk to complain, maintenance man was able to fix it after at least 45 minute wait. We headed to the pool.....yuck! There were dead bugs floating in the water, a hole in the wall under the window, a piece of wood holding a slide glass door open, chains on other doors that said "this entrance is in need of repairs, sorry for any inconvenience" or something to that affect. The pool was VERY cold! Pulled the blankets back on the bed was surprised to see there was a duvet that nobody uses because you know they don't wash them, the middle blanket was all ripped (on both beds), the sheets looked like they needed washed, anytime you move at all the bed continues to bounce for a while after. Told hotel staff we would only be staying that night instead of the reserved two nights, they were ok with it and didn't charge me to cancel. I recommend this hotel do some serious updates!!!

Reviews.Title: “Needs some work”
Reviews.Author: Jared R
Reviews.Content: Hotel had a great breakfast. The jets on the hot tub were broken and sprayed water in your face if you tried to use them, one pool was ice cold while the other was fine. my wife found some food on the floor from the previous occupants while trying to plug in the computer. The theme was very cute with knite statues. Parking was a little crouded but they were very busy.

Reviews.Title: “Great Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: fancher573
Reviews.Content: Breakfast was great, good food and friendly staff. Building A smelled a bit musky when we entered. The pool/hottub area could use a little up dating. Room was clean, housekeeper very nice, Bathrooms tiny. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “It was nice”
Reviews.Author: Bossdawg72209
Reviews.Content: The location was perfect. Breakfast was great we saved so much money on the trip. Rooms where small for a family of four. The pool was always crowded could not get in at times. Customer service was ok they were nice and friendly

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: MW66325
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay here very much - did not like the wooden floors because early in the mornings, we could hear creaks as the people above us moved around. It woke us up. The room was nice and well decorated. Flat screen TV with lots of channels, but no fridge or microwave. Breakfast was on our floor and smelled the hallway up a little, so much so that we weren't interested in eating it. They could definitely use some new bed linens, but the beds were nice and comfy and housekeeping was nice, too. For the great deal we got on this place, we were well pleased. Not a four star hotel, but definitely not a bad place to stay! My son enjoyed the indoor pool and game room. Pool was VERY cold, though, so he couldn't stay in for very long periods of time. I recommend it, just don't expect luxury - expect average and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Reunion Weekend Big problems”
Reviews.Author: Jchollet
Reviews.Content: We had our family reunion at this hotel. And as one would expect there were a million details that required the help of the staff at this hotel. My travel agent had prepared "packets" for each family with the itinerary and what there was do in Branson. I picked up those packets and brought them to the front desk and asked them when each person checked in please give them each a packet. They did not give one person a packet, the Front Desk staff was downright snarky, as if I was asking them to do to much. The hotel messed up the Cocktail Hour suite for both nights, and when I called to complain they did NOTHING to make it right, it was so clear that they could actually care less that I was unhappy. As for the hotel itself, it is old and outdated. The bathroom in my room was old. The blanket on the bed looked to be about 20 years old and pilling and I didn't feel comfortable using it. There are 3 different buildings in which one can stay, I found it confusing and the building we were in was the a long walk to the Front desk and where breakfast was. I could not more unhappy about this experience and will never go there again. Branson itself is a pretty cool place, lots to do for music fans, outdoor fans, etc. We went horse back riding at Sheppard Hills, and that was a wonderful experience. We had an hour long ride for $25 you can't beat that. The places we had dinner "Montana Mikes" and " Florentina's" were both really good food and great service. Thankfully I have a terrific family who handled these mistakes with grace and understanding.

Reviews.Title: “Very happy”
Reviews.Author: tlark47
Reviews.Content: We decided to stay a extra nite in Branson, since we were not at all happy with the hotel we were at. We wanted a change and after going online we were able to get a very good rate so we gave Stone Castle a try. We think the rooms are very nice and really clean, The beds are very comfortable. We loved the old style character of the place. The breakfast had many items to choose from.

Reviews.Title: “TLC by hotel management is needed”
Reviews.Author: Phil D
Reviews.Content: We spent two nights in this hotel, July 25 & 26, 2012. The room had an odor which was most unpleasant (musty). We reported to hotel management but to no avail. Finally went to WalMart, bought some glade air freshner and sprayed the room. Helped some but it was only after we left the window open 24 hours a day that the odor disappeared. Camode also needed repair. Room was clean, rates were comparable to other hotels in Branson, and the morning breakfast was excellent. A little TLC by management could make this an excellent place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “The outside is deceiving!”
Reviews.Author: funfamilyvacays
Reviews.Content: We spent one night in this hotel because we needed an extra night in Branson at the last minute. The hotel had a very musty smell as soon as you entered. There are no connecting rooms at this hotel which I specifically asked for when I made the reservation and was not told they just didn't have them. The bathroom was seriously smaller than any cruise ship bathroom that I have ever been in. You had to sit sideways on the toilet just to close the door and when you did sit on the toilet the "right" way, the toilet paper holder was poking you in the side. The hotel just did not seem clean at all. The outside does look pretty nice but the rooms inside do not. Also, neither of the pools were working while we were there.

Reviews.Title: “A Bargain”
Reviews.Author: grizwald_vacationers
Reviews.Content: My husband and I visited Branson for the first time in July 2012. We had a coupon for a discounted hotel stay at Stone Castle Hotel, so we gave it a shot. We were very pleased the hotel. It was clean, cool, and the staff were very nice and helpful. We stayed two nights. The location was good and it was extremely reasonable. Breakfast was included, and it was filling although nothing to brag about. We would definitely stay there again and would highly recommend it as a economical, no frills hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Accomedations”
Reviews.Author: suzeq721
Reviews.Content: We have the native american room - beautiful - has a king size bed that was very comfy - has a large hot tub (which we used every night) - had a balcony (we are both smokers so this was a plus) . It has a very large variety of breakfast from 6:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m.

Reviews.Title: “Great family reunion”
Reviews.Author: rambosandy
Reviews.Content: We loved the convenience to all of the Branson activities and the central meeting room. Several of the rooms had very poor air conditioning with resultant moldy smells and even dampness in the carpet. The staff was very nice and helped with any of our requests. We especially appreciated the refrigerator provided in the meeting room. The breakfast each morning was great.

Reviews.Title: “I love breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: alishamyers
Reviews.Content: We stayed this last week for 2 days while we were in Branson. I have to say that I did pretty good on this hotel. It was the best one we stayed on our trip. The breakfast was excellent. Everyone said how much they liked the assortment. The room was nice and clean and the hotel staff was wonderful. And, the rate was awesome. The coffee does need to be a little bit stronger but that's all. Thank You, Stone Castle for a wonderful stay and if we're ever out that way again, you'll definitely be seeing us back. :)

Reviews.Title: “bad oders in room, stinks”
Reviews.Author: jim r
Reviews.Content: We stayed here recently and really liked the location. It was central to Branson's activities. The staff was very accomodating with our requests and were very friendly. The beds were very comfortable. On the downside, the rooms & common areas were quite outdated and in need of some repair. Our room smelled damp or smelled of animal uran. i requesded a room w/o the oder, they were more than ready to accomidate my repuest, and gave us a theam room for $50.00 a night more than we were paying. they did reduce it to $98.00 difference in priginal price. we were locked in this property because of the package we bought through the tracel company. We would never go back to this property again, because of the condition of the property, and the bad oders.

Reviews.Title: “Cobbins”
Reviews.Author: Emma W
Reviews.Content: Hotel was an excellent choice for our stay. Rooms were great, staff was very friendly and helpful. Can't thank Rachael enough for all her help in making our family reunion one of best we have had. My family thoroughly enjoyed their stay. Will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location & staff; needs updating.”
Reviews.Author: tboliek
Reviews.Content: We stayed here recently and really liked the location. It was central to Branson's activities. The staff was very accomodating with our requests and were very friendly. The beds were very comfortable. On the downside, the rooms & common areas were quite outdated and in need of some repair. Our room smelled damp and mildewy and the carpet felt damp. The indoor pool/jacuzzi could really use some updating, ventilation, and bigger towels, but water was clean. Overall, we couldn't beat the price for the location and helpfulness of the staff, but I expect our rooms to be cleaner and everything well-stocked & in working order.

Reviews.Title: “I will definately stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Beckyprather
Reviews.Content: I thought this hotel was very much worth it's value. Good location, friendly service, comfy beds, clean rooms, and great breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “Pool area in need of serious repair”
Reviews.Author: trbark
Reviews.Content: We stayed in building 1 for 2 nights. Our room was clean, with fresh linens & new mattresses. The public areas are a different story, they were absolutely grimy. The pool was cloudy and the pool area is in need of repair, the doors are broken, the windows are cloudy, and the paint/baseboards are peeling away from the wall. After our 2nd night we switched to another hotel with a nicer pool so we could go swimming.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, nice people, good breakfast, all for a good price!”
Reviews.Author: Cindy64152
Reviews.Content: This is definitely not a luxury hotel, but for the price, it's a great deal. My husband especially liked the breakfast that was included. He appreciated the staff that continuously kept everything filled and fresh. Eggs, sausage, ham, biscuits and gravy plus hot and cold cereals were served. We will definetly return!

Reviews.Title: “Great time in Branson, MO.!”
Reviews.Author: Mary317
Reviews.Content: We had a very good place to come back to and rest up for our next Adventure in Branson. It is a Great place to bring the whole family.

Reviews.Title: “Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Sabrina B
Reviews.Content: We very much enjoyed staying at Stone Castle Hotel and Conference Center. The employees were very helpful and very friendly. I would recommend anyone going to Branson to stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: TravelinSu
Reviews.Content: Loved this place. Very friendly and kind staff. Very clean and affordable.Would stay here again and again. Just something about staying in a castle......

Reviews.Title: “Comfy beds, good location, hot breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: Brittney L
Reviews.Content: My mom and I took a girls weekend trip to Branson and stayed at the Stone Castle. When we pulled up, we noticed lots of cars in the parking lot and several people in the check-in area. We got nervous. However, check-in was fast, the staff were great, and we were in our room in no time! Even with a full hotel, the rooms were quiet! We never heard anyone else (and we had a room facing outside on ground level!). The beds were really comfortable and the hotel seemed to have been recently updated with nice countertops. There was a free hot breakfast. We were thankful for that! Biscuits, eggs, gravy, along with cereal, fruit, yogurt....needless to say we left full! The location is great! It isn't on the strip, but it is on a side road with easy access to just about everything. We even enjoyed the frozen yogurt place just down the hill and walked there for a late-night treat one night. I would TOTALLY stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price”
Reviews.Author: RfoxtrotMike
Reviews.Content: Standard Room a little tight but OK . Bed comforatable. Free internet easily linked to . Very good breakfast . Easy parking and room access, Close to shows with central location on bypassroute.

Reviews.Title: “Overnight stay at the Stone Castle HOtel”
Reviews.Author: Nightafternight
Reviews.Content: My family stayed overnight the Stone Castle Hotel last week. We have stayed here in the past so it is a familiar place and our children have fond memories staying here when they were toddlers. The hotel is vast with lots of rooms. On this particular stay, we had two rooms with two queen beds. The rooms had adequate space and decorated with a medieval theme. Everything was clean and worked properly. This place is perfect for the family as the rates are favorable (especially if you have a Entertainment Card). The breakfast buffet they provide has hot food (eggs, sausage, french toast sticks, biscuits and gravy) along with your typical hotel breakfast food. There are two swimming pools and both were busy when we were there. Each pool has a hot tub, but one was closed for maintenance. The hallways and rooms could be lit brighter and it is an older hotel. The exterior is very well maintained. Overall, it was a nice clean place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: E D
Reviews.Content: The staff was very friendly, and breakfast was excellent, which is difficult to find at hotels especially at this value. The room was moderate in size and the beds were quite comfortable. Nice layout and great indoor pool area which the kids really enjoyed.

Reviews.Title: “Best value and service”
Reviews.Author: pastordav
Reviews.Content: We had our ministers conference here. It was a beautiful facility and located within minutes of Branson's wonderful attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here!”
Reviews.Author: 24me2
Reviews.Content: I reserved a room here and was very excited about staying at "the castle." Staff was very friendly at check-in. We went up to the room and noticed a funky smell. Being so excoted, we quickly put on our swimsuits, and headed for the pool. When we got back from swimming we were ready to cool off with a nice ice-cold coke. We headed to the ice machine and out came the ice- complete with MOLD! Yes, that's right- mold was in the ice machine and when the water froze, mold was inside the cube! Upon further inspection, we realized that the funky smell was mold in the air conditioning vent. We were furious! My son has asthma and is allergic to mold, so their was obvious we could not stay here. My husband went to the front desk and talked to Dorothy (who was very apologetic). She offered us the other rooms available ( which at 8:00 on the day before memorial day was very slim) but 4 of those 5 also had mold in the air conditioning vents. The other room only had a queen size bed, which would not work for 4 people. Although I booked a "non refundable" room through Expedia, Dorothy helped us get our money refunded. The staff could not have been any better.... We couldn't be angry with them because they didn't know, but I find it hard to believe that management could not be aware of the problem. My advice is this- take your children in the parking lot and let them see the castle from the outside... Don't go in!!!!

Reviews.Title: “ok stay”
Reviews.Author: ddpic
Reviews.Content: The property is very nice. The room is very small. The bathroom is really very small. My husband and I wanted to stay in the room just to rest but, it was just not comfortable. We didn't have any room to walk around in. We kept bumping in to each other. The staff seemed nice. I was disappointed that the hot tub was not running. The bed was to hard for us. I did not sleep well at all. It could have been worse. Did not get to eat breakfast, tried to grab some muffins on the go and they were out by 8:30.

Reviews.Title: “A "Night" in shining armor!”
Reviews.Author: Sabine L
Reviews.Content: I have read the negative reviews and frankly am quite surprised by them. We also got a reduced rate through another booking event, but I was already intrigued with the idea of the themed rooms. We stayed in the one with the stone arch and all the knight themes. Yes, it was an older hotel and room, and it did have a slight musty smell, but the charm overwhelmed everything. There was a gorgeous painting on the wall, the lovely arch made me feel like a real Geneviere of Camelot. There were all sorts of artifacts in the room from helmets to weapons and the waterfall jacuzzi was the most spectacular and ingenious piece. For a couple, this was a truly magical experience and I could not wait to get back to my room each night.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: KFlo0325
Reviews.Content: Sitting in The Captain's Quarters themed king jacuzzi sweet as I write this. Nice room. Comfy bed. Cool decor. The hotel is a bit older but is clean and friendly. Staff is warm and helpful. Great location off the strip but close to everything. Recommended. Gotta go now....anniversary weekend....two person jacuzzi is calling. ;-)

Reviews.Title: “Best Bed Ever”
Reviews.Author: rsrkag
Reviews.Content: Stayed five nights--checked out this morning, April 27, 2012. Friendly staff, especially the breakfast staff. Housekeeping was adequate. Room was priced right. Nice TV; free WiFi. Bathroom was tiny. Beds were heavenly! Most of the events, exhibits, shows, and restaurants were just a short ride from the hotel. We would certainly stay here again when visiting Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Crazy Cropper Scrapbook Retreats”
Reviews.Author: Jmpurves
Reviews.Content: This past weekend was the 3rd time for holding my Crazy Cropper Scrapbook Retreats at Stone Castle. My group of 60+ ladies converge on the hotel for 4 days and nights and we kind of just take over the place! Between Joe and Marlene, they make sure we are treated like queens! Every requests is handled quickly and efficiently. I have to give a shout out for Mary Ann and Tammy, who make our dining experiences, which is 3 times a day for 4 days, absolutely amazing! And the maintenance crew (please put their names in here for me), bend over backwards, setting up our crop room, hauling out our massive amounts of trash and making sure our electrical needs are met. The group just raves over the super comfy beds and overall cleanliness of everything. We can find absolutely no reason to change, so you all are just stuck with us! Thanks to everyone who is involved in making us all feel right at home. See you in the Fall, 2012! Janis Purves Crazy Cropper Scrapbook Retreats

Reviews.Title: “Do not go here”
Reviews.Author: DarthVader1
Reviews.Content: This hotel had terrible smelling rooms and they pool was broke......the place was overpriced and smelt like cigarratte smoke,overrated

Reviews.Title: “our stay at the Stone Castle Hotel”
Reviews.Author: conwaystorm
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and the beds were good. Every one was friendly and very helpful. The breakfast was wonderful. The staff worked very hard to keep up with the big crowd in the middle of the week. It was spring break. Will stay here again when we return.

Reviews.Title: “Very Dissappointed”
Reviews.Author: ltmccamp
Reviews.Content: I booked a "themed" room this past weekend and needless to say for $145 it was a joke. I booked a Queen bed and was given a full. The room was right by the elevator and stairs and you could hear everything in the hallway. The room number was 516 and titled the Geisha Room. Furthermore, the room was set up terribly. The TV was on a swivel mounted on the wall in a very awkward spot. The jacuzzi tub worked fine, but the drain was stained with rust. I felt like we had the old janitor closet that was transformed into a room. The breakfast was fine, but the hotel kitchen staff had numerous signs up such as "Take what you want, but please eat what you take.". I found this very unprofessional. The hotel staff was also sitting in the dining room, gossipping about some inappropriate topics. Again, unprofessional. Overall, I was very dissappointed. For $145, I should have gone somewhere else. Next time, I'll just go to the Marriott.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: maryclubb
Reviews.Content: the room was very clean . the staff was very friendly . any time you needed anything they were there to help . we will stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay off the strip!”
Reviews.Author: peachesnbeal
Reviews.Content: I would have to say that their standard rooms were quite small for four people.We upgraded to their theme suite. Enough room for 6 people. We had a balcony and a whirlpool tub. The tub easily fit my husband who is 6'. The free hot breakfast was excellent.The staff was very friendly. My only complaint is the hot tub in the pool area did not have enough water and it was cold. Otherwise it was great. Its behind the strip which made it nice.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the money.”
Reviews.Author: jfpTexas
Reviews.Content: This is an older property consisting of three buildings in a row and if you are in the last building it is quite a trek down to breakfast. I liked it because it was incorporated into my exercise routine. They are remodeling the pools and updating the rooms (they now have flat screen tvs!) so give them a chance. It worked for us and would for you too if you consider you are there only to sleep and swim. Loved Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Breathtaking, relaxing, comfy, heartwarming, safe, affordable, the best place we have ever ever stayed!”
Reviews.Author: mommioftwo2
Reviews.Content: We started our very first fam vaca at the grand country inn, after a worker there made fun of my autistic son and made my fam so upset, we decided to pack up and leave,.sitting in the car cryin i decided what the heck, even of its costly, the stone castle is beautiful and has a pool, got there and the sweetest girl named hope reassured our comfort and my two little boys fell in luv with her and the hotel :-) way more affordable than i imagined it! My autistic son even asked me to buy and give miss hope a rose lol hes 6! Needless to say our first vaca turned our more perfect than i had anticipated all bc we stayed here! Everything happens for a reason and i know my boys will never forget the memories we made at Stone Castle! Thank u and God bless u miss hope & the other staff! Cant wait til the summer! The boys miss u already and we just got home lol. Xoxoxo

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Anthony G
Reviews.Content: Wonderful is the only word that is remotely adequate to describe my family's stay at The Stone Castle Hotel & Conference Center. Mary Anne, our breakfast cook and hostess, was absolutely the best. Her cooking skills are up there with those of my grandmother and mother. The other hotel staff were very cordial and polite. They made you feel as if you were a guest in their home. Stone Castle is the only place we will stay at in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Better Than Expected...”
Reviews.Author: Jason M
Reviews.Content: I was very leery staying at this hotel after all reviewing a lot of negative reviews. However, a last minute decision to go to Branson brought us here. The hotel is nice from the exterior. Typical Branson - if you're expecting an W Hotel, Vegas-esq spread, or even a nice Marriott Renaissance - you might keep looking. However, it's neat and tidy. The location is great, its off the Yellow Route and accessible to anywhere in town. Yes, the reviews were accurate on the interior. It's a bit dated, but clean. Yes, the TV in our room was about the size of my iPad. No worries, though - we didn't go to watch the TV. The owners are in the process of updating rooms, so I think this is a known issue. However, the room was very acceptable, as were the common area and the pools. Breakfast was good and the usual hot items. The service was great. We were traveling with an infant (yes, we're those people) and they were more than happy to accomodate our special requests at our late check in. All in all, it was a nice trip. We would likely stay again for another quick trip.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful time!”
Reviews.Author: Mark N Melinda C
Reviews.Content: My husband,17 month old grandson and I stayed at Stone Castle on New Years weekend. We had an awesome time and the service was great! They have a delicious hot breakfast, and are close to the strip yet not on the strip. We enjoyed the indoor pool and spa as well. All of the staff was very helpful! We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Kinda Hard to Find and is Showing its Age”
Reviews.Author: Geoark1946
Reviews.Content: This is a sprawling place but it is beginning to show its age. The room was clean but worn the AC/Heat was very noisy and the towels really needed to be replaced. Again we had a pricing issue we had a reservation conformation for one price and the clerk that checked us in would not honor it AT ALL. When we checked out a real manager was on duty and did adjust the room rate to match what the confirmation showed.

Reviews.Title: “branson in december”
Reviews.Author: stlaaa
Reviews.Content: we booked this hotel for the indoor swimming pool. We traveled mid week so the hotel was on the quiet side. One thing we like to do is check in and hit the pool. We are in our fifties so we sure don't act out of line. We went and checked out the pool. The pool room is very warm and it appeared we would be in there all by ourselves. Great ! So we get changed grab a few beers and head back. That is when we noticed the sign-no beverages or food allowed in pool room. As i stated it was very warm in there, i am not sure how they would expect anyone to stay in there without even a soda or water to drink. My husband inquired at the desk if they were firm on these rules. The women said that maybe she might allow a plastic bottle of soda or water but for sure no beer. Needless to say i'm sure we won't return. The hotel seemed fine otherwise. Next time we hit Branson we will be sure to inquire about pool rules ahead of time.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoy staying here every time we come to Branson.”
Reviews.Author: Branson12
Reviews.Content: Very nice accomodations. I recommend this hotel to all my friends when they stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Thanksgiving Weekend”
Reviews.Author: Lynn T
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at The Stone Castle Hotel & Conference Center in Branson, MO from Wednesday thru Sunday and had a very good time. The breakfast in the mornings was very good. I would recommend this to every one. They also have family suites that are great.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful experience!”
Reviews.Author: Carol Y
Reviews.Content: I have stayed several times with them and the staff has always been extremely nice and helpful. The rooms are very nice!

Reviews.Title: “Great Find”
Reviews.Author: debbie d
Reviews.Content: Quite by accident we have located a great place to stay in Branson. Rooms are reasonable, property is clean, and everyone is sooo friendly. You've got to try it!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: sth16
Reviews.Content: I just spent 4 days in Branson on business and found the Stone Castle to be both a convienient location and a great value with a staff that amied to please. Their hot breakfast was included and was excellent with eggs, sauage, biscuits and gravey, and french toast as well as cereal and youart. Not a typical contenintal breakfast. Rooms are clean, and the staff helped me do what I needed to. I will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean rooms, friendly people, and a good value.”
Reviews.Author: Sparklyone
Reviews.Content: We found our room to be as nice as many higher priced hotels we've stayed in. The complimentary breakfast was better than most.

Reviews.Title: “Nice getaway weekend”
Reviews.Author: dory_fish77
Reviews.Content: We stayed at The Stone Castle for a conference this past weekend. We have stayed there for three years in a row now for the conference and always had a good experience. This is by no means a luxury hotel, but check in was fast and easy, and our room was nice and clean. The one problem we encountered was the TV. This normally wouldn't be an issue for us but the World Series, game 7, was on the first night of our stay. We got to our room just in time for the game to start and found in our large TV cabinet a tiny, tiny TV. It was about a 13 inch TV. My husband called the front desk and within 5 minutes a maintenance person was there with a nice, 32-inch flat screen and replaced the TV for us. He was very friendly and understanding. The staff is friendly, they have a large breakfas selection, and are very accomodating to our group that attends for the conference. The rates are very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Ramona B
Reviews.Content: Check in process was very pleasant, room was nice and CLEAN!! We have stayed there before and loved it every time. They have an excellent continental breakfast. Employees were friendly and very helpful. Pillows were even good, which is usually not the case at most hotels (from some of my previous experiences at other hotels). The view was nice and once again we were extremely pleased wth our stay there!! Will definitely reserve there when I visit Branson anytime.

Reviews.Title: “a step back in time”
Reviews.Author: Linda B
Reviews.Content: i enjoyed staying at this hotel because it was like living in a fairy tale.The knights in shinning armour protecting the castle. The view of Branson was beautiful. The service and the politeness of the employees was exceptional. The rooms were very neat and clean and the beds were the best that we have slept in except at home We enjoyed the hot breakfast very much. I would recomend staying at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Our Favorite Hotel in our Favorite Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: JudyReed
Reviews.Content: The beds are soooo comfortable. The rooms are First Class! The breakfast is the best buffet we've had anywhere in Branson. We stay here every time we visit Branson, which is about 5 times a year. We love it there & we Love the Stone Castle!

Reviews.Title: “" pretty decor and good location"”
Reviews.Author: Lois L
Reviews.Content: Clean and pretty rooms with great, comfortable mattresses! We go to Branson once or twice each year and have stayed at Stone Castle for several years and will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Travelingmissorui
Reviews.Content: We go to Branson at least 3 times a year and we have stayed at many of the hotels and this one had the most comfortable beds and a great hot breakfast. The TV's could be bigger but overall a great value. The staff was very friendly and the pool area was always clean.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Chris S
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at the Stone Castle in Branson, service was excellent, room was very clean, staff very friendly. We will definitely be coming back for another stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, great staff...”
Reviews.Author: Rachel R
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the honeymoon suite that had a wonderful Jacuzzi tub for 2. The bed was comforatable and the pillows were a bit fluffy. The room had an updated flatscreen T.V. which was very nice and the room had a small balcony that you could sit on. The bathroom was small but the room itself was very large and spacious. The room still needs a little updating like lighting and carpet and the ceiling needs new paint but the staff was very friendly and helpful and we were very comforatable and we felt the price was great. Thank you to everyone!

Reviews.Title: “Awful hotel, I will never trust tripadvisor ever again.”
Reviews.Author: mopanahi
Reviews.Content: The hotel appears nice on the outside and from the photos but the rooms are tiny, the bathrooms are tiny, and the rooms smell. It wasn't just our room that was this way, but the 2 other families we were traveling with. The air conditioner made so much noise, we were barely able to sleep at night.Also the pool was old and in terrible shape. Also I just realized on my credit card statement that they had charged me for an extra night, I got it worked out after I called them but if I had not noticed I'd be paying for a night I didn't even stay there. They claim that they forgot to charge one of the families I was traveling with and they're now going to charge them, which I know for a fact that they paid for their 2 nights in full and now they're going to have to resolve this matter as I did. Ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: “NOT a good place to stay!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Edie M
Reviews.Content: We stayed at your hotel from Oct 6 - Oct 9th. We were in the oldest and the furtherest West building of your property - Room 220. The building was unsecured - anyone could go into the pool area and the bldg itself. You had to have the key card to get into the rooms but otherwise it was open to ANYONE. We had to walk all the way down the hill to the first bldg to eat breakfast (thank goodness the weather was nice and not raining) -- there were not enough tables to sit and eat at 8am - as there were 3 large bus groups there. We had to take our food out to the lobby and eat. The food was NOT hot on Friday morning - OK on Sat. & Sun - no do-nuts except on Friday morning. No bacon (as shown in your picture). The back deck off of our bldg. was splintered, needs painting badly - one railing was not safe - I would be afraid for an older person or child to be out there). Bathrooms are tiny with one small sink (not enough room to set our personal stuff on it) and my husband is 6'5" and had to leave the door open to use the bathroom. TVs are small (possibly 17 -19 inch) in a huge armour that took up lots of room. Rooms are small with no closet but a hanging rack on the main wall. We saw several people HAVING A HARD time pushing people in wheel chairs up that hill to our bldg after breakfast and older people having problems getting from the 3rd bldg to the 1st bldg to eat breakfast. For the price of these rooms they were definitely a DISAPPOINTMENT AND WE WILL NOT STAY THERE AGAIN and WILL NOT RECOMMEND THIS MOTEL to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: christina b
Reviews.Content: We always stay at the Stone Castle. The rooms are always nice and clean and the location is nice since it sits right on the Yellow Route. It is very easy to access all the attractions and the strip. Since our first stay here we have never looked at any other hotel.

Reviews.Title: “a good time was had by all”
Reviews.Author: christmas152
Reviews.Content: We stayed with a group recently and all had a good time....the group had experienced problems unrelated to the hotel but when we got there the treatment and service we received was wonderful.....we were made to feel right at home......I believe Joe was the gentleman who greeted us and was very kind and professional.....Maryann (I think that was her name) in the breakfast room was an absolute angel.....she went out of her way to make everyone feel special........this is an excellent choice for groups-affordable......receptive to needs.......Also the in charge cleaning lady was very professional and friendly. all these things are assets......

Reviews.Title: “Comfy rooms, great staff, convenient”
Reviews.Author: TinaOlathe
Reviews.Content: the rooms were small as others said, but clean and very comfortable. The staff were very friendly and helpful. the breakfast was good. The pools were clean and towels were provided.

Reviews.Title: “Okay for the money”
Reviews.Author: Traveln45
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a neat hotel and the people are friendly. We stayed in the 50's themed room and enjoyed it very much. The only complaint I have is that the breakfast(bisquits and gravey) was not good at all. We stayed here to get the daily breakfast, but after the 2nd day there, we decided to leave the hotel and eat breakfast someplace else. I hate to be petty about this, but I am a travel agent and I stay places constantly so I can give good reviews and learn for myself. The morning entertainment was great although.

Reviews.Title: “had a ghreat time we will be back”
Reviews.Author: maryclubb
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean. the food was great. and the staff was very friendly. much more than i expected . see you soon

Reviews.Title: “LST CONVENTION AT THE STONE CASTLE WAS GREAT.”
Reviews.Author: michgrandma
Reviews.Content: My husband and I attended an LST convention at The Stone Castle Hotel at Branson MO.. We were at the hotel for 4 nights and 5 days, and we were treated very well by both staff and management. Our room was very very clean and the bed was "O" so very comfortable. The treatment that we received was so great, that the LST planners are thinking of having there again next year. The breakfasts and banquet dinner were very well planned, and the food was great.

Reviews.Title: “We Shall Return”
Reviews.Author: Evelyn L
Reviews.Content: The hospitality and service was excellent. When we checked in the front desk was friendly and very helpful. I would recommend this hotel The Stone Castle Hotel & Conference to everyone. I would stay again and perhaps upgrade to one of the other rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Room”
Reviews.Author: Stacyd75
Reviews.Content: Fast check-in/out and friendly, helpful service. Great location as it s off the strip but close enough to everything!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised!!”
Reviews.Author: drean410
Reviews.Content: What a pleasant surprise we came accross at the Stone Castle Inn. Immediately upon entering the lobby area we were greeted by two smiling faces who made us feel right at home! The location is perfect as its not directly on "the strip" but right off if it as to avoid the hustle and bustle! My kids absolutely loved the fact that after a long day of sightseeing and whatnot, they were able to swim until 1am! Breakfast was pretty good, beds comfortable, and the price outstanding! Can't wait to come back!

Reviews.Title: “we loved it and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: larry a
Reviews.Content: We stayed in 50's room, it seened as if you were back in the 50's with the decor and pictures, service was great

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel I'll be back”
Reviews.Author: rob j
Reviews.Content: Not really sure what all these bad reviews are about me and my family loved this hotel.... Two indoor pools open late our room was clean and beautiful. The staff were super friendly. We will be staying here everytime we come to branson!!!!!!!!! And dont forget the all you can eat hot breakfast. Thanks stone castle for making me and my familys trip to branson so awesome!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “All Veteran Reunions should look elsewhere!”
Reviews.Author: jimtucker
Reviews.Content: Room was smelly, could not sleep at night with the a/c on too noisy,bathroom fan sounded like a liftoff at Cape Canaveral,small 19" tube type tv, carpet dirty, one ice machine for all 3 floors,breakfast was terrible unless you like powered eggs and hockey puck biscuits. I also blame Branson Tourism Center for booking our reunion in this place . The hotel must be giving them a great kickback. Veteran runions please look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “20th Brigade Vietnam Reunion”
Reviews.Author: Quickwater
Reviews.Content: I had the distinction of going through Veronica at Branson Tourism and she was pleasant and concerned with my booking a room. First of all I had to pay in advance. We arrived in July 2011 and the following concerns the motel. First of all I will say the good thing as the bed was comfortable and clean. That's about it. The air conditioning in the buildings did not work properly. It was hot and humid. The ice machines broke down and the third floor did not have and ice machine. The conference room was adequate but sultry and hot. The water was shut off for about four hours and that messed up the pools chorine and they were shut down for one night. There was no restaurant, bar and the ATM did not work. The hotel staff was not helpful but the cleaning staff was very good. Overall, I would not stay at this motel again for the price. By the way, the smoke detectors did not work in our building. The bathrooms were so small you had to stand behind the door to close it. Seems to me the constructors of this building were not playing with a full deck. I don't mind paying more money for a nice place to stay but when the motel is in the shape of the Stone Castle Motel, I would not reccommend it to anyone. I give this motel one star.

Reviews.Title: “One night stay last option”
Reviews.Author: Kverboon3
Reviews.Content: This is a hotel I would choose if nothing else was available the service was horrible people at the desk were not friendly the beds were comfy that's about it parking is very limited we had to park in the back and you can't use the back doors to get out you have to walk all the way around the building which to have locked backdoors is a fire hazard to me and the fire alarms do not work very unsafe!!

Reviews.Title: “worst ever”
Reviews.Author: jameyers21
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this place for 5 awful nights for a conference. The a/c was bad during a heat wave. Free breakfast; that's using the term breakfast loosely. The entire place looked dark, dingy and medieval so they're keeping with the whole castle theme, very dungeon-like. The rooms were dirty, small and the t.v. was tiny, though housed in a large armoire. What?! They do not have room service, restaurant or bar. The ATM didn't even work. The staff didn't seem interested in providing service. I would never stay there again and, in fact, would tell others to steer clear. One good thing about the place was the bed. It was really comfortable!! The fire alarms were all disabled throughout the entire hotel. It should be condemned.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Ernie-Sharlene R
Reviews.Content: We LOVED it here! They have onsite laundry and SEVERAL pools. Nice view and great prices. Esp if you have the Entertainment Book www.entertainment.com. You get HALF off if you have the card from the book. We went there for a timeshare thing and we ended up really loving it there and have had our grown kids/grandkids stay there, as well. They even have an arcade onsite! It's a great place to stay when you come to Branson. Oh and the Dockers Restaurant is next door and it's excellent, too!

Reviews.Title: “Has Potential”
Reviews.Author: Nancy2009
Reviews.Content: We just got back from a 5 day stay in Branson. Our first two nights were spent at The Stone Castle. The positive things about the hotel: Pretty landscaping, the beds are comfortable, the rooms are cool - air conditioner works well, the eating area for the continental breakfast is very large and roomy, great location - walking distance to many attractions and quiet area. The rooms are decorated nicely and the hotel manager is energetic. On the negative side: We were greeted by hotel staff that weren't familiar with which credit cards they accepted. We used an American Express and were told our card was declined, not a good feeling when starting a vacation. I had to call American Express to find out that the hotel did not have a contract to do business with American Express. Next, the first room that was assigned to us smelled like moth balls, we were given another room which was much better. The rooms seem small, tight fit for a family of 4. The pools were very cloudy, could not see the bottom of the pool (which is not deep). My son found a long hair in his pancake. I used the iron and when I pressed the steam button rusty water sprayed all over the shirt I was ironing. Very small TV. There are better hotels for the money, but this one has potential.

Reviews.Title: “Dank, and a little musty”
Reviews.Author: flintjarvis
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in April 2011 and the room my wife and I got was behind the stairwell on the ground floor next to the hill side. Not much of a view, unless you like to look at a hillside. It seems that when it rains, the water collects next to the building and creates a musty smell here. The plus side of this location is that it is very quiet. Breakfast was ok including waffle machines where you can make your own. Be sure to spray first, or your waffle will get stuck. We looked at the indoor pools, but didn't swim because the water looked very cloudy.. yuck! I'm sure that if we looked around, we could have found better.

Reviews.Title: “Great time”
Reviews.Author: Critters78
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great getting us all in and very pleasant to work with for our riding group. Rooms were nice and breakfast would have been great but found the temp of the food a little cool. Their was no morning show as their write up said but overall it was still a wonderful time.

Reviews.Title: “Old, needs updated.”
Reviews.Author: todavis
Reviews.Content: This hotel was probably great at one time. It needs a lot of tender care to restore it back to it's original character. The pool area was in terrible shape. The carpet was old and the building had a musty smell to it. The staff was friendly. Too many more hotels in Branson to stay here again. Go on down the road.

Reviews.Title: “Worst place I've ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: happyscout1
Reviews.Content: First off, all of the fire alarms were not working in any of the buildings. Major no-no. I should have left on that alone. The themed rooms are a joke and about as cheesy as you can get. The "jacuzzi" didn't drain, the main tub didn't hold water and the hotel in general just smells unclean. To top it all off was the fact that the TV cabinet is HUGE so one would expect to open it and see at least a large flat screen TV. Not here, it was a 16 inch old school TV that I couldn't even see from the bed. The location of the hotel is good, I'll give it that and If you don't mind cheesy decor and can stand the smell then this hotel won't bother you. If you aren't into cheesy then give this one a pass. It was a less than desired experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: tpawla
Reviews.Content: Loved the frendly staff, location was great. Very clean.

Reviews.Title: “We will definetly be back.”
Reviews.Author: Erica628
Reviews.Content: We had an awesome stay at this hotel. The employees were outstanding and the service was great. The rooms were very nice and beds slept awesome. With having a Silver Dollar City season pass the price was very afforadable. Planning on staying again in July, September and possibly December. The hotel has more than one pool that is convenient.

Reviews.Title: “We always enjoy our stay there.”
Reviews.Author: lcbart
Reviews.Content: The staff is always friendly and accommodating. The rooms are always clean and very stylish. The continental breakfast is one of the best we have had. Love staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect three day stay”
Reviews.Author: sth16
Reviews.Content: Spent 3 perfect days and nights at the Stone Castle June 19th through 22nd. Great beds, friendly staff, super hot breakfast including eggs, sausage, pancakes, and biscuits and gravey. Convienient location on the yellow route. We will be back to the Stone Castle again.

Reviews.Title: “NOT EVEN WORTH THE DISCOUNT”
Reviews.Author: randhperez
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here as a couples get away. We were very excited about the theme rooms and two person jacuzzi tub. However when we checked in the front desk staff was not very pleasant or helpful. It was only about 9pm and they seemed very rushed to get us out even though we were the only ones checking in at the time. There were notes posted everywhere about non working fire alarms. Upon entering the elevator the signs were in broken frames and the carpet was very dirty in Bldg B. When we got to our "themed room" we were greeted by a mural of kangaroos on the wall and a leather like pillow on the bed. The jacuzzi was no more than a single person whirlpool tub you would find in a house. The bathroom was very tiny. The towels were very itchy and hard. The tv in the room was so small and outdated it was hard to watch. The carpet in the room was very dirty looking. We could here everything the people above us were doing and the ones around us. When we called the front desk to ask for another room they said the only room was a room with two queen beds and on the first floor. We would get it for the same price we paid for our "themed" room. We chose to stay put. Finally the noise eased down a little and we were able to sleep. The breakfast was in the first bldg and not that great. We chose to eat out the next day. This hotel is in serious need of repair and renovations. Upon Check out my husband realized he had left his shoes in the room. We went back to the hotel only to be informed the housekeeping supervisor had left for the day. She is the ONLY person that has a key to lost and found. If we wanted his shoes back then we would need to pay shipping because he should not have left anything in the room. Not even maintenance that was still behind the front desk or the new manager on duty had access to lost and found. I have worked in the hotel industry and I know that lost and found should never be guarded by one single person on the housekeeping staff. After a very unpleasant conversation with the not so nice front desk clerk the new manager did offer to pay the shipping if they were able to find the boots. This was not a hotel we would ever return to. The discount was good through Priceline and the exterior looked cool but the service and the accommodations was not worth any of it.

Reviews.Title: “Was a great stay!”
Reviews.Author: loreejwhite
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very clean with friendly service and reasonable prices. We enjoyed our stay and have stayed there several times. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed in lukewarm "hot" breakfast”
Reviews.Author: grandpa48
Reviews.Content: We'd heard from family members that this was a great hotel. The room was smaller than we expected. We barely had room to set up our laptop computer. We were disappointed in the breakfast--sausage and eggs overdone and lukewarm and coffee just barely hot. We had cereal instead after the first day. Doubt if we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Requires Update and TLC”
Reviews.Author: thewench61
Reviews.Content: We attended my husbands Military Reunion and our room was a great disappointment.. The first thing we noticed was a very dirty carpet, large cabinet with a very outdated telivision and our bathroom was very small. Upon our arrival we noticed reminders everywhere that the fire alarms were not in working order, I am not sure but what is the Fire Marshalls response to that? Also our friends were able to get a better rate on the net then we were getting at a group rate??? Explanation was that we were allowed access to meeting room and other facilities. Excuse me but all amenties are included in the rates with most hotels that I have stayed at.........the kitchen manager was great and provided an excellent breakfast to all hotel guests. Bravo! We were terribly disappointed and will not be back .

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: 65536traveler
Reviews.Content: Excellent guest service. We met our children and grandchildren at the Hotel for Memorial day weekend. Are rooms were close together, very family friendly Hotel.The beds were very comfortable. Rooms and halls were clean and neat. The breakfast experience was GREAT, the live music show was fun and entertaining. The hot tubs and pool areas were very nice. All in all a wonderful experience. We are looking forward to our next visit to Stone Castle.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and very clean”
Reviews.Author: NancyC
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Stone Castle Hotel for a Silver Dollar City getaway. Booked on the phone and received very courteous assistance. They offer a good discount for Silver Dollar City season ticket holders. Our room was clean as well as the hallways. We had a standard room but they do offer theme suites. Beds were comfortable and breakfast is included. The breakfast offered cereal, doughnuts, toast, eggs, biscuits and gravy, fresh waffles, fruit, juices, milk and coffee. They even have entertainment during breakfast. Stone Castle is conveniently located on the yellow route for easy accessibility to Branson as well as Silver Dollar City. I highly recommend Stone Castle Hotel. We will be staying here again when we return to Branson this summer and fall.

Reviews.Title: “The Stone Castle is a wonderful place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: drieke
Reviews.Content: We enjoy staying at the Stone Castle in Branson, Missouri. The rooms are clean, staff members are helpful and friendly, and we feel safe staying there. Their breakfast is very good, also. We have stayed there many times and have never have been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoy your stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: heldandheld
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay again in Branson. This is our third stay at the Stone Castle. The staff is friendly and willing to give that extra effort to make your stay stress-free. The rooms are very reasonable, clean and relaxing. But, most of all The Stone Castle is only minutes away from the best shows and attractions with plenty of parking. The breakfast is great and the pool and hot-tub an added plus.

Reviews.Title: “Pet Friendly, average stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Freklz1977
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Stone Castle Inn for a Spring vacation and would grade it a C+. To start with the positives, the location was awesome, right off the strip with very little traffic running through so at night you could sleep with the windows open. The staff was pleasant and accommodating. We brought our dog and asked that they don’t clean the room because I feared the dog would get loose and they accommodated that request. When we checked into our King bed room, it was very small and the scene outside the window was less to be desired (it looked out into the alley) and they graciously moved us to a higher up room with two queen beds. The outside grounds were clean and for the most part the inside was too. Things we were not happy with were the pool facilities, the “hot” breakfast, the bath tub floor and the outdated bedding. The two pools were very outdated and looked dirty. Hence that is why you only see one picture of it online. The breakfast was terrible and I guess that’s what you get when it’s “Free”. I would recommend only going to it if you want a light snack, otherwise spend the 5.99 at the Plantation or go down the road to Panera Bread. I’m picky about cleanliness so when I noticed the bedding had cigarette burns tells me that have not changed over bedding in years. I threw it off the bed for the remainder of the trip. The bath tub floor creaked so bad I thought it was going to break. They can do a much better job at vacuuming too. Overall it was okay compared to others that were on the strip, but again, we only paid $59.99 plus $12.00 for the pet so we got what we paid for in the end. I probably won’t be back to the Castle Inn knowing there were other nicer places that take pets. This is a good place to stay if you are on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Great location with better than expected amenities AND good price!”
Reviews.Author: annie31800
Reviews.Content: This hotel was just off the Branson main drag--not too far, but far enough to be a quieter area. It was clean, nicely decorated, and the staff was very helpful and friendly. It has 2 indoor pools in different locations with jaguzzi. Beds and pillows were very comfortable. The continental breakfast had more choices than I've ever been offered before. Our entire family, including our married daughter and family stayed in multiple rooms. We all enjoyed it very much and plan to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful vacation”
Reviews.Author: hilltopyankee
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Stone Castle Hotel in February. Everything was great. Clean, friendly staff, the best part was the pool and the great breakfast. We have recommended this to our friends and we are looking forward to our next visit. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “The best stay we've had in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: woodsdlb
Reviews.Content: My wife and I travel to Branson several times a year. We have stayed in area hotels in the past but now prefer to stay at Stone Castle. The staff is very accomodating and friendly. The rooms are well maintained, clean, and spacious. We had a first floor room close to the pool area during our last stay. There were several ball teams staying here as well as a young women's conference. We were not bothered by any outside noise from the hallway as the kids and adults made their way to the pool. The breakfast is great! The staff keeps everything full and clean. We recommend Stone Castle highly!!

Reviews.Title: “Great value with excellent location”
Reviews.Author: palimar
Reviews.Content: We found the Stone Castle to be very convenient to all the shows, restaurants,and shopping that were important. The rooms were very nice and we enjoyed the hot breakfast each morining.

Reviews.Title: “Would Go Back again”
Reviews.Author: honeybear_1987
Reviews.Content: We got in very fast the lady at the front desk was very nice. We had the Jewel of the Nile it was very nice we loved it. We went to the first pool room the hot tub was not hot at all it was very cold and it was blowing out cold water, the pool was alittle bit cold. We then went to the 2nd pool room the hot tub was hot and the pool was still kinda cold. Later on that night we went back to the 1st pool room the pool was warm and the hot tub was warm we pushed the bubble button it was still blowing out cold water. The breakfast was very good. We will go back again we did have alot of fun.

Reviews.Title: “A great weekend get a way spot.”
Reviews.Author: musicmom_02
Reviews.Content: We were drawn to the stone castle hotel for the indoor pool for our weekend get a way. Turned out we were very plesently surprised at what we received. A very nice room, lovely decorations, and amazingly comfortable beds. The pool area was clean and comfortable with a nice hot tub as well. We will deffinatly stay here again soon.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: tadmills
Reviews.Content: Service was above and beyond. Great facility with pool and hot tub open late.

Reviews.Title: “very family friendly”
Reviews.Author: jc63301
Reviews.Content: the breakfast was great along with the pool area. The free entertainment was just they way to start the day. It was a great a family gettaway. i will be back.

Reviews.Title: “This was our 2nd stay and it was better than the 1st.”
Reviews.Author: lcbart
Reviews.Content: We had stayed here once before about a year ago and this time it was even better. The people were very friendly and helpful. The rooms were very comfortable and the continental breakfast was excellent. I would recommend this location to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: CountryMomx2
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd stay at the Stone Castle Hotel. It is a good value for the money. Nothing fancy, just a good clean place to stay. It has 2 swimming pools, which was good because if one was really full, the other one usually wasn't. Our room was clean. The bathroom was squeeky clean. The lighting in the main part was a little on the dark side, but we weren't in our room very much, so this wasn't an issue. It did make it hard to read of an evening though. Breakfast was good and the breakfast room was very clean. The attendant worked very hard at keeping the tables clean and around the serving dishes picked up. We'll definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We love Staying at Stone Castle evey time we come to Branson”
Reviews.Author: JPudenz
Reviews.Content: We love Stone Castle Hotel in Branson. They always have great rates for my faimly since we end up with 2 rooms with our bunch. With the pool being open to 1:00 am we always make it to swim before we turn in for the night. The breakfest is great for our bunch because it offers hot and cold foods. It is location makes it great to get to all the diffrent atractions. The hole Family always look forward to staying at the Stone Castle Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The only place we stay in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: theresa112378
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Stone Castle Hotel twice now and have been very pleased both times. The rooms are nice and the location is close enough to access everything we want to do in Branson, but off the strip so we can get to it quickly. The pool and hot tub are open until 1 am which worked great for us when we got in late. The staff have always been extremely friendly. The kids love the big breakfast with eggs, waffles, b&g, donuts, etc. and we were lucky enough to see a breakfast show during one of our stays.

Reviews.Title: “My sister and I had a great stay at the Stone Castle Hotel & Conference Center!”
Reviews.Author: chrissie056
Reviews.Content: My sister and I travel to Branson several times a year and always try different places to stay that are convenient,clean, and budget friendly. We also prefer inside corridors. We found the Stone Castle Hotel last weekend and loved it! The staff was great, the breakfast music show was fun and we would love to stay there next time we go to Branson! It was great!

Reviews.Title: “Greatest hotel on Earth”
Reviews.Author: bransonvisitor_10
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Stone Castle Hotel for three nights............it was great with free breakfast. I can wait to go back to Branson ..........thats the only place that we will stay when we go to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “cozy”
Reviews.Author: samy1273
Reviews.Content: very cozy, nice, pool hours are great! friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Fun place for a weekend getaway in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: bubnbrat
Reviews.Content: Not the first time we stayed at the Stone Castle, and won't be the last. Fun theme rooms and great location "behind" the strip.

Reviews.Title: “I <3 Dorothy, the front desk clerk!”
Reviews.Author: busygirl47
Reviews.Content: Everyone here was very nice. The breakfast was awesome. Everything was what I expected. Great value for the money! Come and Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Great location with friendly staff and quality rooms with an excellent breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: clynch7
Reviews.Content: We thoroughly enjoy Stone Castle. They have friendly staff and quick responses to your needs. The other amenities are nice as well such as the pool, game room, and breakfast room. Their rates are excellent.

Reviews.Title: “I don't like being in a hotel with dogs.”
Reviews.Author: IowaFarmwife
Reviews.Content: This hotel is outdated. The walls are paper thin. You can hear water running and people next door talking. The rooms are very poorly lit. The bathrooms are minute. I complained about the dogs in the unit and they did move us to the building which doesn't allow pets, which is the only good thing I have to say about the place.

Reviews.Title: “Close to all attractions and shopping.”
Reviews.Author: pipelinemike
Reviews.Content: Nice room, good breakfast, close to shopping outlets and all attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay at the Stone Castle”
Reviews.Author: getawaygal1
Reviews.Content: We booked our stay through travelocity, and received an excellent rate of about fifty dollars a night. Overall, our group was very pleased with the hotel. We booked three rooms, and we were all right in the same area. Check in was easy, as was check out. Breakfast was very good; I am a relatively picky eater and I don't understand why other reviews complain about the breakfast, especially given the cost of this hotel. The waffles were great, as were the donuts. Not too many healthy options, but they did have oatmeal. The breakfast show on both days was great if you like country music, but a bit on the loud side. The rooms were very clean, but ours did have a bit of a musty smell that went away after we turned on the air. The rooms are on the small side, but that didn't matter to us as we weren't in there very much. The beds were fine, and the decor was very nice. The bathroom was very, very tiny. When you opened the door it came within one inch or so of the toilet, but again, that was not a problem for us, just something to be aware of. Overall, we were very pleased with our stay at the Stone Castle and would definitely stay there again, especiall for the great rate that we got!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accomdations and we were allowed to bring our pet with us.”
Reviews.Author: countryman01
Reviews.Content: The front desk people were very nice and very helpful. The hotel was very clean. Our room was very nice and agian we were allowed to bring our pet inside.

Reviews.Title: “Just ok”
Reviews.Author: mamabear&twins
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel November 4-6. If I had to stay in Branson again, I probably wouldn't choose this hotel. The rooms were nice and clean but the shower was very loud when standing in it. It made a creaking sound. Soundproofing wasn't very good. When people closed their doors we could hear it in our room. The breakfast was powdered eggs and the gravy was awful for the biscuits and gravy.

Reviews.Title: “Very poorly ran Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: htgolfer1
Reviews.Content: Our vacation was from October 22 -26 and I made our reservation by calling them a week in advance to reserve rooms for my wife and I and my parents. Upon arrival the girl at the front desk (Joy) said it only showed one of the two rooms reserved for us. I had to go out to my laptop and bring it in to show her both conformations for our rooms and she finally found it. Then she discovers that they made a mistake and reserved one room for the 26-30. She seemed completely lost at her job and yet she was the same girl I had talked to on the phone when I reserved the room. She was trying to pass the buck and yet I knew that it was indeed Joy that I had talked to when I reserved the rooms. At this stage they said they only had another room with a single queen available and it was in a different building than the other room. What is the point of vacationing together if you're in completely different buildings? I had to cancel the rooms and then frantically search for another Hotel with an indoor pool in Branson on a Friday night. It was a complete nightmare after a long drive. Thank goodness we found The Cascade Motel and they had a family suite for us and a far Superior place to stay for about the same price. I highly recommend the Cascade. Beware of The Stome Castle and the desk girl named Joy, they are a joke.

Reviews.Title: “This place is very enjoyable.”
Reviews.Author: Glendaloo
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at stone castle. Loved the clean rooms and pool. Reasonable prices too.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: olwill
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel early October and loved it. The pool is a good size for an indoor pool. The free breakfast is very good-lots to chose from. We will definatley stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Newly Remodeled Hotel”
Reviews.Author: moroadrunner
Reviews.Content: We spent two nights at the Stone Castle Hotel. We had an excellent experience. The entrance to the hotel was welcoming. The front desk staff was friendly and ready to assist us with our needs. The rooms were newly remodeled. The beds slept like a cloud and the pillows were wonderful. The room was clean with nice décor. The bathroom was clean and linens were well kept. We also enjoyed a great breakfast buffet with lots of options. Would stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “Our Experience at Stone Castle”
Reviews.Author: fredandjan
Reviews.Content: When we visit Branson, which we do quite often,we always try and find a good place to stay that offers a good value and is in a great location. WE have seen the grounds and buildings several times but thought it would be too expensive for our budget. To our surprise, this year we stopped and checked it out. Not only did we find it suitable for our budget, the staff and all the amenities were just excellent. We certainly plan to stay there the next time we are in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “This Hotel is comfortable, clean, affordable and friendly.”
Reviews.Author: plee67
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel 3 times and we have always had a good experience. We usually take a different family with us each time we go and they are always satisfied and say they will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean , close to attractions...”
Reviews.Author: herndon_patti
Reviews.Content: Nice room. Nice view. Enjoyed the breakfast. Would like to see Bananas though.

Reviews.Title: “Worse Hotel EVER!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Hellokittylover32
Reviews.Content: Run away from this place as fast as you can. We stayed in the 3rd building on the 2nd floor. The bedding felt nasty and we found hair. The beds were poorly made. The bathroom is TINY! The entire hotel smells old and musty. We checked in on a monday and paid for 2 days we went back on tuesday to go ahead and pay for another night. The lady at the front desk took our credit card and then the phone rang she held up her thumbs and mouthed " Your good to go" So we left the next day we went swimming and about 3:30 someone knocked on the door. Before I could even get up to answer it a guy was opening our door and very hatefully said " You need to see the front desk about staying another night" I said 'Ok" He said you need to go RIGHT NOW. My husband went to the front desk we thought maybe there was a issue with our card because we had paid cash before. They were very rude! Even though my husband tried to explain to them what had happened. NAsty hotel!!!! Nasty staff. Too many nicer places to stay in Branson for the same price. UGH! The breakfast was very bland and the music show wasn't that great either. Do not stay in the third building.

Reviews.Title: “great place to be away from home.”
Reviews.Author: catching
Reviews.Content: Everything was great---Front desk people were friendly and was always willing to help in anyway...Rooms were clean and fresh..Breakfast was good and good music to listen too....I would rate this hotel and one of the best Branson has to offer. We will stay with them on our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Would recommend Stone Castle for everyone.”
Reviews.Author: VanBurenZgirl
Reviews.Content: We loved the Stone Castle. It's in a very quiet part of Branson, the rooms are super clean, the staff is very helpful and they have a great hot breakfast. The most important thing to me is the honesty of the staff. When we checked out, I left my purse in the drawer of the entertainment center and didn't realize until I'd gotten somewhere that I needed a credit card. I called the hotel and the maid had, already, cleaned the room and brought the purse to the front desk. This will be the place we stay, from now on, when we go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet location Easy to find Clean rooms Paved and almost flat parking”
Reviews.Author: moonstone0005
Reviews.Content: We liked the Stone Castle because the staff was friendly and helpful. The non smoking room did not smell of previous smokers. The location is easy to find and close to Highway 76, the main highway where the shows and restaurants are located. The hot breakfast was tasty, and there was a good selection available. The live entertainment during breakfast was enjoyable. The parking lot was large and almost level which in Branson is rare, as many parking lots are on a hill side. This hotel is located on a side road that parallels the very busy Highway 76, so you can travel side roads to get to the music shows much quicker than on Highway 76. The hotel is south of Highway 76.

Reviews.Title: “Not the best....but not the worst. Its served its purpose”
Reviews.Author: gpd132
Reviews.Content: I was in town for a function at the hotel, which is why i stayed there. Its definitely an older hotel and seemed to be recently freshened up a bit. The rooms were clean and had nice furnishings. The TV was an old picture tube TV...which i don't see much of any more. The free breakfast was not bad....and we had live entertainment as well. The hotel is located just off the main road going through the Branson attractions but was joined by many other hotels on the same road. The staff was helpful and polite.
